unknown
images reveal no evidence of perfusion of the neurocranium; specifically, there is no perfusion of the cerebrum and cerebellum.

there is no evidence of concentration of tc-99m bicisate by cerebral cortical tissue.
absence of perfusion of the brain (brain death)
brain death
34 y/o male with history of cardiac arrest during surgery.
